text: Pablo Saavedra Reinado (born January 29, 1975 in Pontevedra) is a swimmer from Spain. He has a disability and is an S9 type swimmer. He raced at the 1996 Summer Paralympics. He finished third in 4 x 100 meter 34 point freestyle relay race. He raced at the 2000 Summer Paralympics. == References == Category:Spanish swimmers Category:Living people Category:1975 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:People from Pontevedra Category:2000 Summer Paralympics Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type S9
title: Pablo Saavedra Reinado
